channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Photoshop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Photoshop

item.title: CVE-2022-28270|2024-09-16T16:18:32.698Z -- adobe -- photoshop
item.description: Adobe Photoshop versions 22.5.6 (and earlier) and 23.2.2 (and earlier) are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious SVG file.

item.title: CVE-2021-36006|2024-09-16T16:18:58.475Z -- adobe -- photoshop
item.description: Adobe Photoshop versions 21.2.9 (and earlier) and 22.4.2 (and earlier) are affected by an Improper input validation vulnerability when parsing a specially crafted file. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to disclose arbitrary memory information in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
